petGame

类 Pets

  • java.lang.Object
    • petGame.Pets
  • 直接已知子类:
    Ant, Cat, Dog, Frog, PanDa, Poney

    class Pets
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements pet part of pet game. This Constructs basic action and function which the pets using in pet game.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    sly31 & mxu19

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        This method is set the name of the pet.
        参数:
        name - is Set the name of current pet the player choose.

      • nextDay

        public void nextDay()
        All actions and situations the pet using or currently get.
        参数:
        food - is one of the Foods. used by eat method.
        play - is one of the Toys, used by play method.
        health - equal 20 when get sick. health equal 50 when get cure.
        fun - plus 10 when get cure.
        death - equal true,the pet die.

      • rebirth

        public void rebirth()
        This method is about Rebirth and all value back to initial value.
        参数:
        death - is Set as false when running the rebirth.
        hungry - is back to initial value 50.
        tried - is back to initial value 50.
        fun - is back to the initial value 50.
        health - is back to initial value 50.
        toilet - is back to initial value 50.
